 2012-14832012-11-02,  ,  PMO,  , 
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment to the position of special advisor to the Prime Minister, JACQUES MONET, of Toronto Ontario, as a member of the Advisory Committee on Vice-Regal Appointments, to hold office during pleasure for a term of two years, on a part-time basis, effective November 2, 2012.
